Enable CDM extension using ontology (#1263)

# Description

This PR enables CDM extension data modeling through data modeling using
ontologies. Several methods in codebase have been updated to enable
parsing of specially structured URIs of owl:Class such that CDF space,
version and external id can be extracted

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Added

- Support for CDM extension through ontological data modeling
